original_text: And Judah went against the Canaanites who lived in Hebron (now the name of Hebron was formerly Kiriath-arba), and they defeated Sheshai and Ahiman and Talmai.
korean_text: 유다가 또 가서 헤브론에 거주하는 가나안 족속을 쳐서 세새와 아히만과 달매를 죽였더라 헤브론의 본 이름은 기럇 아르바였더라

sentences.original_text: And Judah went against the Canaanites
now the name of Hebron was formerly Kiriath-arba
and they defeated Sheshai and Ahiman and Talmai
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 세새와 아히만과 달매를 물리쳤습니다.
